originalText.text: I won't  say the school as a whole is bad nor good.  I can say that there are staff members who need to be reminded what their roles are.  There is a lady who everyone calls Ms. Yvette who is I guess in charge of the lunch room periods. This lady really needs some retraining.  The school has no play yard since it's under construction, ok granted nothing much can be done about that, but this lady doesn't let the kids talk to each other while on their recess and is always calling kids names.  I for one do not play well with bullies, and name calling, smacking kids on the head is not what she is there for.  She needs to be checked on this behaviour.

originalText.text: Some teachers act like they care in front of me but when my daughter is having problems with other students they don't let her explain her point of view. Mr.Soto was the best principal Mrs.Hasty is not a good principal

originalText.text: This school is not a good school no more.zI don't like the way the stuff treat our kids.When one student don't have good behavior they punish all the sudents,sitting them on the yard for 20 minutes under the sun in lunch time.I haven't seen any school with that rule before. I think they need nwe stuff in the main office.

originalText.text: This school is slowly deteriorating since Mr.Soto retired! They are changing too much too fast. The staff has changed too drastically. He was the glue that kept that school together.
